Name: DriftOn
About the game: DriftOn is an infinite racing game in the surreal fracturing world. You drive through terrain that keeps breaking apart. Crumbling race track introduces its challenges that test speed of your reaction and skill of predicting the road in its fractured state. Features Beautiful minimalistic 3D design and surreal graphics of the game world. Vehicle physics. Actually drive your car - not just change lanes. Different game modes: with constant or increasing car speed and track destruction effect. Different difficulty modes. Synthwave outrun music.
